lines.text: Yes, but we're primarily interested n the body of a hobo that was found dead in the wreckage. He was wearing a money belt containing fifty thousand dollars.

[Whistles]
A little spending money! He must have been king of the hobos!
Hey, Gabby, come on. What's the matter?
Oh, I'm worried about my girl.
Al right, so if you can't keep the date tonight, she'll cry on her mother's shoulder.
That's just what I'm worried about. She hasn't got a mother.
